name: Cardinal Die-rections
description:
Made for the Little Awful Jam 2016, this top down shooty game forces you to balance how often you get hit in order to keep your mood from getting too excited or too chill.

WASD or Arrow Keys to fire. Mouse position for look.

Grab bus tickets to move onto the next stage. Grab powerups to make your gun shoot faster. Find the peeps who stole your meds!

Higher resolutions will sometimes frigg up the New Game button.

This game uses the Cardinal font from dafont.com
